subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard committed to the Rockets after mulling offers from five teams and became the first star in modern N.B.A. history to walk away from the Lakers while still in his prime.
snippet: Dwight Howard committed to the Rockets after mulling offers from five teams and became the first star in modern N.B.A. history to walk away from the Lakers while still in his prime.
